languages.text: ...приказал{mf||а} собрать из раскаявшихся пленных рабочих мануфакторума штурмовую колонну и дать им право искупить свое преступление кровью.
...ordered an assault column to be formed from the repentant manufactorum workers, granting those captives the right to atone for their crime with their blood.

languages.text: ……命令愿意悔改的工人组成突击队，让那些俘虏以自己的鲜血来换取救赎。
languages.original_text: ...ordered an assault column to be formed from the repentant manufactorum workers, granting those captives the right to atone for their crime with their blood.

traits.locale_text: ……命令愿意悔改的工人组成突击队，让那些俘虏以自己的鲜血来换取救赎。

languages.text: ... ordnete die Bildung einer Angriffstruppe aus den reuigen Arbeitern des Manufactorums an. Diese Gefangenen erhielten das Recht, mit ihrem Blut für ihr Verbrechen zu büßen.
languages.original_text: ...ordered an assault column to be formed from the repentant manufactorum workers, granting those captives the right to atone for their crime with their blood.

traits.locale_text: ... ordnete die Bildung einer Angriffstruppe aus den reuigen Arbeitern des Manufactorums an. Diese Gefangenen erhielten das Recht, mit ihrem Blut für ihr Verbrechen zu büßen.

languages.text: ... ordenó la formación de una columna de asalto con los obreros arrepentidos del manufactorum, concediendo de ese modo a los cautivos el derecho a expiar sus crímenes con su sangre.
languages.original_text: ...ordered an assault column to be formed from the repentant manufactorum workers, granting those captives the right to atone for their crime with their blood.

traits.locale_text: ... ordenó la formación de una columna de asalto con los obreros arrepentidos del manufactorum, concediendo de ese modo a los cautivos el derecho a expiar sus crímenes con su sangre.

languages.text: ... a ordonné que les ouvriers repentants du manufactorum forment une colonne d'assaut, accordant ainsi à ces prisonniers le droit d'expier leurs péchés grâce à leur sang.
languages.original_text: ...ordered an assault column to be formed from the repentant manufactorum workers, granting those captives the right to atone for their crime with their blood.

traits.locale_text: ... a ordonné que les ouvriers repentants du manufactorum forment une colonne d'assaut, accordant ainsi à ces prisonniers le droit d'expier leurs péchés grâce à leur sang.

languages.text: …悔い改めた聖工場の労働者から突撃隊を編成するよう命じ、捕虜たちに彼らの血をもって罪を償う権利を与えた。
languages.original_text: ...ordered an assault column to be formed from the repentant manufactorum workers, granting those captives the right to atone for their crime with their blood.

traits.locale_text: …悔い改めた聖工場の労働者から突撃隊を編成するよう命じ、捕虜たちに彼らの血をもって罪を償う権利を与えた。

languages.text: ...Tövbekâr manufaktorum işçilerinden bir taarruz sırası oluşturulmasını emretti. Böylece tutsaklara, günahlarının bedelini kanla ödeme fırsatı sunuldu.
languages.original_text: ...ordered an assault column to be formed from the repentant manufactorum workers, granting those captives the right to atone for their crime with their blood.
